ingredients.name: Mozzarella Breaded
ingredients.description: Breaded fried mozzarella with marinara sauce, parmesan cheese, parsley.

ingredients.name: Buffalo Chicken Wings
ingredients.description: Fried chicken wings, Buffalo sauce, bleu cheese dressing served with bleu cheese dressing.

ingredients.name: Firecrackers
ingredients.description: Spicy grilled chicken and cheese tortillas, with avocado-lime dip.

appetizers.title: Bogo Traditional Wings
appetizers.description: Fried chicken wings tossed in spicy Buffalo sauce served with crisp celery sticks & Bleu cheese dip.

appetizers.title: Lasagna Fritta
appetizers.description: Fried breaded lasagna, topped with parmesan cheese and marinara sauce, with creamy alfredo.

appetizers.title: Cake Spicy Shrimp
appetizers.description: A generous portion of our signature crispy, hand-breaded shrimp tossed with spicy cherry peppers and garlic butter.

appetizers.title: Italian Cheese Bread
appetizers.description: Slice bread coating with mozzarella cheese And marinara sauce, basil.

appetizers.title: Buffalo Chicken Quesadilla
appetizers.description: Griddled flour tortilla /buffalo pulled chicken cheddar-jack cheese blend house-made pico de gallo , drizzled with ranch sauce

appetizers.title: Fried Shrimp Scampi
appetizers.description: Lightly breaded, fried and tossed in our signature scampi sauce.

appetizers.title: Buffalo Shrimp
appetizers.description: Hand battered shrimp tossed in our own spicy tangy Buffalo sauce. Served with crispy celery sticks and bleu cheese dressing.

appetizers.title: Herb Mozzarella Breaded
appetizers.description: Our Signature Handcrafted Herb Crispy Mozzarella Cheese Breaded Served With Italian Marinara Sauce.

appetizers.title: Firecracker Roll
appetizers.description: Spicy grilled chicken and cheese tortillas, with avocado-lime dip.

appetizers.title: Chicken Potato Twisters
appetizers.description: Spiral sliced potatoes, buffalo pulled chicken topped with our traditional spicy queso with Monterey Jack cheese, pico de gallo, sour cream and fresh cilantro.

appetizers.title: Mac Bites
appetizers.description: Crispy Fried Macaroni Cheese Bites Bedded With Marinara sauce.

appetizers.title: Buffalo Cheese Fries
appetizers.description: Seasoning Crispy Cheesy French Fries Topping With Buffalo Pulled Chicken, Drizzled With Ranch Dressing And Onion Shaves.

appetizers.title: Mexican Cheese Fries
appetizers.description: Mexican style of French fries mixed with cheese, chili beef, chipotle ranch dressing, and onion chives.

appetizers.title: Mexican Cheese Nachos
appetizers.description: Crisp corn tortilla chips topped with melted Colby cheese, jalapeño slices served with the classic trio: pico de gallo, guacamole, and sour cream.

soup-salad.title: Southern Soup
soup-salad.description: It’s westerner soup style, mixture of vegetable with a charbroiled chicken top with corn tortilla chips and fresh diced tomato and onion chives.

soup-salad.title: Santa Fe Salad
soup-salad.description: A mix green tossed with our House made Avocado Buttermilk dressing, Top with Charbroiled BBQ chicken and tortilla chips.

soup-salad.title: Chipotle Chicken Salad
soup-salad.description: Pulled chicken breast served on a bed of mixed greens, romaine lettuce, avocado, mixed cheese, diced tomato, red onion, cilantro and crisp tostadas – drizzled with cilantro lime vinaigrette and sriracha aioli

soup-salad.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
soup-salad.description: Slices of marinated charbroiled chicken breast heaped atop our Caesar salad.

soup-salad.title: Thai Salad
soup-salad.description: Satay Chicken Strips, Lettuce, Carrots, Rice Noodles, Cucumbers, Bean Sprouts, Cilantro, Peanuts and Sesame Seeds Tossed with Thai Vinaigrette.

sandwiches.title: Brisket Quesadilla
sandwiches.description: Tortilla bread slices stuffed with angus brisket, melted cheese, pickled onions, pico de gallo, BBQ sauce and ranch served with seasoning French fries.

sandwiches.title: Bordelaise Steak Sandwiches
sandwiches.description: Slice of Brisket Angus slow roasted with BBQ bordelaise sauce With hand-made onion straw served with seasoning French fries.

sandwiches.title: Chicken Parmigana
sandwiches.description: Butter-Fly crispy fried chicken topping with marsala sauce and mozzarella cheese Serve in ciabatta bread and aioli Sirach sauce.

sandwiches.title: Southern Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Battered chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, pickles, spicy mayo made with Chipotle Pepper Sauce on a soft bun.

sandwiches.title: Smoky Glaze Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Grilled chicken, Signature Applewood BBQ sauce, hickory-smoked bacon, red cheddar, Cajun-spiced crispy onion strings, lettuce, tomato, pickles and Glaze mayo on a soft bun.

sandwiches.title: Caribbean Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Cajun grilled chicken sandwich with Caribbean sauce Serve with fries and frizzled onion.

burgers.title: Hand-Crafted Cheese Burger
burgers.description: Our char-grilled burger is topped with, melted American cheese and finished with bacon mayonnaise. Served on a toasted bun with a side of our Signature Glaze and crispy seasoned fries

burgers.title: Stacked Bacon Burger
burgers.description: All-time favorite burger, with melted Colby cheese, caramelized onion and crisp bacon. Served with crispy fries.

burgers.title: Craving Burger
burgers.description: Char-grilled beef patty seasoned with blackening spice and topped with Chipotle Siracha® aioli, cheese sauce, lettuce, tomato and onions. Serve with bacon mayo.

burgers.title: Ultimate Cheese Burger
burgers.description: Char-grilled beef patty seasoned with blackening spice White cheddar, aged all-natural cheddar spread, lettuce, tomato, red onions, pickles, hickory-smoked bacon, Breaded Mozzarella Cheese.

pastas.title: Cajun Chicken Pasta
pastas.description: Sautéed chicken, red bell peppers in a spicy Cajun Alfredo sauce, Parmesan-Romano and fettuccine. Served with a warm honey bread

pastas.title: Craving Pasta
pastas.description: Crispy chicken strips tossed with Buffalo sauce served on top of a creamy three cheese pasta and garnished with diced fresh parmesan and green

pastas.title: Lasagna Rollata Al Forno
pastas.description: Lasagna roll with Five Cheese Marinara Sauce, Alfredo sauce, Italian blend shredded cheese.

pastas.title: Meatball Linguine
pastas.description: Enjoy Linguine and Meatballs with sauce marinara. Our sauces are prepared fresh daily with garlic and herbs. Served with three meatballs. Note: Our meat sauce is made with pan-seared beef and Italian sausage

pastas.title: Shrimp Zitti Pasta
pastas.description: Sautéed Shrimp , white base sauce, Parmesan-Romano and Ziti . Served with a warm honey bread.

pizzas.title: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
pizzas.description: This buffalo chicken pizza is full of spicy buffalo sauce, chicken, and drizzled with a creamy ranch dressing

pizzas.title: Cowboy Pizza
pizzas.description: It’s slow smoke brisket tossed with Apple wood Barbecue sauce, beaded with our homemade barbecue ranch dressing with pickled onion, mozzarella cheese, and Colby cheese

pizzas.title: Spinach Pizza
pizzas.description: Spinach cream, Cajun grilled chicken, tomato, basil, mozzarella cheese

pizzas.title: Sundried Pizza
pizzas.description: White pizza, basil, mushrooms, artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes, sautéed goat cheese, shredded mozzarella.

pizzas.title: La Pizza De Pollo
pizzas.description: Our traditional pizza dough topping with marinara sauce, alfredo sauce, marinated grilled chicken, red and green bell pepper, mozzarella cheese

steaks_and_ribs.title: Blackrock Ribeye
steaks_and_ribs.descriptionArray: Ribeye is one of the cuts that comes from the front part of what’s called the longissimus. A steak house classic, our boneless Ribeye is a hearty cut on its own. Expertly aged and each hand-selected to order, all three of our ribeye steak sauces are excellent examples of what makes this prized, Prime cut so popular. Serve on stone rock which is always hot and cook as you like. Comes with mashed potatoes, garlic broccoli, and mashed potatoes.

steaks_and_ribs.title: Cowboy Ribeye
steaks_and_ribs.description: Ribeye is one of the cuts that comes from the front part of what’s called the longissimus. We called it this because it would be a crime if you didn’t try it! It is one of our favorites because of the combination of juicy marbling and fire-grilled, bone-in flavor. Serve on stone rock always hot and cook as you like. Comes with mashed potatoes, garlic broccoli, and our traditional steak sauce.

steaks_and_ribs.title: BR T-Bone Steak
steaks_and_ribs.description: Fire-grilled bone-in porterhouse, a NY Strip & filet in one juicy cut. 400 grams served with our famous black rock stone, with two sides of your choice and three different kinds of steak sauce.

steaks_and_ribs.title: Steak Au Poivre
steaks_and_ribs.description: Well-marbled, savory steak with pure beef flavor, seasoned with black pepper. Served with mashed potatoes and frizzled onion.

steaks_and_ribs.title: Outlaw Ribeye
steaks_and_ribs.description: Well-marbled, juicy, and savory. Seasoned and flame-grilled for a delicious natural flavor.

steaks_and_ribs.title: Black Rock Pepper Steak
steaks_and_ribs.description: The peppercorn Striploin crust itself is made by placing the steak in a bed of cracked black peppercorns.

steaks_and_ribs.title: Mint Glaze Lamb Chops
steaks_and_ribs.description: Bone-in lamb chops marinated in a mint-infused bordelaise and grilled over an open flame. Served atop horseradish whipped mashed potatoes and wilted spinach.

steaks_and_ribs.title: Applewood Full BB-BACK RiBS
steaks_and_ribs.description: This full rack of ribs is expertly cooked to ensure they’re fall-off-the-bone tender. Then, we fire-grill them and glaze them with our apple-wood barbecue sauce and serve with our crispy seasoned fries.

steaks_and_ribs.title: Beef Short Ribs
steaks_and_ribs.description: Three or bone beef short ribs Texas style! Flame-grilled & glazed with our house-made BBQ sauce, this rack is then crusted with a flavorful Texas spice-mix.

wagyus.title: Wagyu Ribaye Rock
wagyus.description: The supreme Ribeye US cut steak 5-6 mb best choice of the amazing day!

wagyus.title: Wagyu paper steak rock
wagyus.description: The supreme Striploin US cut 5-6 mb best choice of the amazing day!.

seafoods.title: Scampi Salmon
seafoods.description: Char-broiled Salmon fillets with scampi sauce and extra virgin olive oil, grilled slice tomato and it is served with mango corn salad.

seafoods.title: Brown Shrimp Tilapia
seafoods.description: Grilled Tilapia fish with citrus creamy shrimp, and roasted veggies, citrus rice.

seafoods.title: Crusted Tilapia Fish
seafoods.description: Crusted tilapia fish served with mango corn salad and pilaf rice.

seafoods.title: Coconut Fried Shrimp
seafoods.description: Hand-battered golden crispy fried shrimp served with crispy seasoned fries, cocktail sauce and your choice of side.

seafoods.title: Blank Salmon Glaze
seafoods.description: Char-broiled Salmon fillets with burri blank , lemon creamy sauce and extra virgin olive oil, sautéed shrimp and it is served with mano corn

chickens.title: Skillet Chicken Gravy
chickens.description: Marinated chicken mash potato Gravy sauce and mix cheese.

chickens.title: Crusted Parmesan Chicken
chickens.description: Boneless crispy chicken breast cooked with Parmesan crumbles serve with fettuccini cream spinach.

chickens.title: Chicken Bella
chickens.description: Marinated Chicken Breast Topping With Creamy Mushroom Artichoke, Serve With Two Side From Your Choice.

chickens.title: D’ Vil ‘S Chicken
chickens.description: Crispy fried chicken with siracha Cheese and sour cream serve with two side Choice.

chickens.title: Smoky Mountain
chickens.description: Marinated Chicken Breast Topping With Smoked Applewood BBQ Sauce , Pepper Slice Bacon , Mix Cheese Serve With Two Side From Your Choice.

chickens.title: Smothered Italian
chickens.description: Marinated Crumbled Fried Chicken Breast Topping With Italian Marinara Sauce , Mozzarella Cheese, Serve With Two Side From Your Choice.

kids_meals.title: Cheese Burger / Chicken Burger
kids_meals.description: Cheese burger served with french fries / Chicken Burger served with french fries.

kids_meals.title: Marinara Sauce with Choice of Pasta
kids_meals.description: Pick your favorite pasta with marsela sauce! Add protein for an additional charge. Marinara Sauce with Choice of Pasta.

kids_meals.title: Pink Sauce with Choice of Pasta
kids_meals.description: Pick your favorite pasta with pink sauce! Add protein for an additional charge.

kids_meals.title: Alfredo Sauce with choice of pasta
kids_meals.description: Marinated Chicken Breast Topping With Creamy Mushroom Artichoke, Serve With Two Side From Your Choice.

desserts.title: Dulce De Leche
desserts.description: American style dulce de leche, a sliced layer caramel and cream cheese cake drizzled with hot caramel fudge a scoop of vanilla ice cream dusted with cinnamon.

desserts.title: D’ Barro Moka
desserts.description: Pie of ice-cream mocha with roasted almond and topping with Oreo crumbles and almond shaves, chocolate and caramel.

desserts.title: Rock Slide Brownie
desserts.description: It’s a mouth-watering hot rock slide brownie, drizzled with hot white chocolate and chocolate fudge top with vanilla ice cream and roasted pecan nuts.

desserts.title: Dulce De Leche
desserts.description: American style dulce de leche, a sliced layer caramel and cream cheese cake drizzled with hot caramel fudge a scoop of vanilla ice cream dusted with cinnamon.

desserts.title: Chocolate Lovin Spoon Cake
desserts.description: You won’t find a better chocolate cake than this one, it’s amazing chocolate cake sliced, drizzled with rich chocolate sauce a scoop of vanilla ice cream and strawberry slices.

desserts.title: Molten Lava Cake
desserts.description: A popular molten chocolate lava cake, oozing hot chocolate sauce from inside with scoop of vanilla ice cream drizzled with chocolate and caramel fudge.

desserts.title: New York Cheese Cake
desserts.description: Our homemade New York style cheesecake, breaded deep fried until golden brown, bedded caramelized apple cinnamon and scoops of vanilla ice cream drizzled with white chocolate and chocolate fudge.

desserts.title: Apple Crostata
desserts.description: A European-style tart, you’ll love this cinnamon treat warm from the oven. Apple cinnamon, cashew nuts, scoop of vanilla ice cream chocolate drizzled and strawberry slices a homemade dessert made special just for you.

iftar_craving.title: Family Sampler
iftar_craving.description: Treat your family on the best sampler ever! Fire Crackers, wings, shrimp, Fried mozzarella.

iftar_craving.title: Duo Sampler
iftar_craving.description: Enjoy the best duet ever! Two types of Quesadilla chicken, brisket and pieces of buffalo chicken bites.

iftar_craving.title: California Rock
iftar_craving.description: A wonderful assortment of ribeye steak, grilled shrimp with scampi sauce, and beef short ribs covered with barbecue sauce, served with Two side dishes of choice, two soups, One salad and Two Ramadan drinks, Arabic coffee and Dates.

iftar_craving.title: Smoky Platter
iftar_craving.description: Choose the best of our smoky Beef back ribs, lamb chops, and brisket slice, with Two side dishes of choice, two soups of choice, One salad, two Ramadan drinks, Arabic coffee and Dates.

iftar_craving.title: Mississippi Platter
iftar_craving.description: A premium selection of tender grilled salmon fillet with scampi sauce and flavorful tilapia, topped with Cajun cream shrimp. Served with crispy coconut-fried shrimp, along with your choice of two side dishes, two soups, and two salads, two ramadan drinks, arabic coffee and dates for a complete and satisfying dining experience.

iftar_craving.title: Country Platter
iftar_craving.description: For chicken lovers, this is a rich assortment of Country craving chicken, Smootherd Italian chicken and fried shrimp. Served with linguini marinara pasta, Two soup of choice, One salad, Two ramadan drinks with Arabic coffee and Dates.

iftar_craving.title: Make Your Own Iftar
iftar_craving.description: Duo Sampler served with two main dishes of choice, two soups, one salad, two ramadan drinks, arabic coffe and dates

iftar_craving.title: Make Your Own Iftar
iftar_craving.description: One Ramadan Appetizer served with four main dishes of choice, two soups, two salad, four ramadan drinks, arabic coffe and dates

items.itemDesc: Start the party with Lemonade mix with Fresh sour mix, Pineapple juice, Pineapple diced, Blue lagoon syrup Top with lemon lime soda
A popular combination of raspberry, cranberry and lime flavors.
Sweet and perhaps a little salty, A blend of Rose syrup, Home made agave nectar and signature fresh sour mix with soda water.
Sweet mango and peach puree mix with our Home made Brewed black tea with cool lemon fresh squeezes.
A new option you wont find at the local Lemonade stand. Refreshing blend of Wild mint syrup, Our signature fresh sour mix and Home made Agave nectar with fresh Mint leaves Torn and lemon Squeezes.
A popular blend of raspberry, cranberry and lemon flavours.
A blend of dried oranges, agave nectar, fresh orange juice and fresh lime.
Tropical feel with guava puree, passion fruit puree, strawberry puree, blended with fresh sour mix and Caribbean flavored syrup.
A winner drink! Thick , rich whip of strawberry puree, banana, grenadine and cream of coconut.
Innocent and delicious. Our mango and passion smoothie is a natural favorite. Mango, Passion fruit puree and ice are blended together into smoot, cool beverage that’s so tasty.
Carribbean flavored syrup, pineapple juice and cream of coconut.
A tropical sensation with guava puree, passion fruit puree, strawberry puree, mixed with fresh sour mix and Caribbean flavored syrup.
Combination of fruits sensation, Juicy blueberries and Pomegranate syrup, mixed Carribbean flavored syrup, with fresh mint leaves and homemade fresh sour mix.
The best mojito in town, Taste strawberry and coolest fresh mint leaves mix with our signature fresh sour mix, strawberry slices and lime fresh squeezes.
Chill out with coolest Mojito, featuring Carribbean syrup and Sundried orange syrup, Passion fruit puree mix with our signature fresh sour mix and a fresh mint leaves torn.
Our signature Mango mojito made with Caribbean and Sundried orange flavored syrup, mango puree, fresh mint leaves torn, fresh sour mix, fresh ripe mango diced.

milkShakes.title: Milk Shakes
milkShakes.description: Craving club Bartenders take shakes as seriously. That’s why ours come out rich, thick, smooth and creamy

sensations.title: Sensations
sensations.description: Our new summer drink sensation, Mix with House made agave sour, Fresh sour mix, wild fruits Flavored with Caribbean and Sundried syrup
